item.title: Applet not working
item.dc:creator: @Ipwnurasss Ipwnurasss
item.description:
@Ipwnurasss wrote:

Here’s my code, and its not working:

[code]import java.applet.*;

public class MyApplet {

public static void main(String args[]) {
    new MyApplet().init();
    frame.add(applet);
    frame.add(button);
    frame.pack();
    frame.setSize(350, 350);
    frame.setVisible(true);
}

public static void init() {
    button = new java.awt.Button("Hi");
    frame = new java.awt.Frame("My Applet");
}

static java.awt.Button;
static Applet applet = new Applet();
static java.awt.Frame frame;

}[/code]

Here’s my HTML code:

[code]

[/code]

Applet.jar is my jar archive. What’s wrong?
